text: Khodz () is a rural locality (an aul) in Khodzinskoye Rural Settlement of Koshekhablsky District, Adygea, Russia. The population was 2772 as of 2018. There are 50 streets.Улицы аула Ходзь == Geography == The aul is located on the left bank of the Khodz River, 51 km south from Koshekhabl and 70 km east from Maykop. == Ethnicity == The aul is inhabited by Adighes. == References == Category:Rural localities in Koshekhablsky District
title: Khodz, Russia
